name: electron-project
description: 基于Electron的桌面软件开发环境

scripts.win32: electron-packager ./app its-master --platform win32 --arch ia32 --out dist/ --icon=./build/favicon.ico --overwrite --download.mirror https://npm.taobao.org/mirrors/electron/ --asar
scripts.win64: electron-packager ./app its-master --platform win32 --arch x64 --out dist/ --icon=./build/favicon.ico --overwrite --download.mirror https://npm.taobao.org/mirrors/electron/ --asar
scripts.mac: electron-packager ./app its-master --platform darwin --arch x64 --out dist/ --icon=./build/favicon.icns --overwrite --download.mirror https://npm.taobao.org/mirrors/electron/ --asar
